tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was struck by a dental emergency only few weeks after relocating from Delhi to Mumbai and, in the middle of the Covid 19 situation, finding a reliable dentist made me quite apprehensive. 
However, someone recommended Dr Laud and from the moment I walked through his clinic door there was no looking back.  
From all the preventive measures taken at the clinic, to a friendly, comforting approach, very thorough assessment, professional treatment and modern, state-of-the-art facilities, it was a great, all-in-one experience indeed.
I am so appreciative of the time and attention Dr Laud and his team have given to every detail of work required in my case and, it goes without saying, that I would wholeheartedly recommend him to anyone requiring professional, caring dental assistance.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Laud is a professional. They have moved into a brand new clinic which is spacious and welcoming. They have a big staff and more facilities at the clinic itself. The staff is efficient, warm, and professional. Dr. Laud extracted my wisdom teeth today, and the procedure went smoothly and painlessly. Payment procedure was also efficient. I was happy with the whole process. I wish Dr. Laud the best of luck. You will be in good hands if you visit him.

review: I have been going to dr.gautam laud regularly for all my dental problems.he has opened his clinic on a holiday to attend to me in emergencies.during COVID,I felt very safe in his clinic because he strictly followed a sanitisation program.he took a lot of trouble to save one tooth of mine which had to be eventually removed.i trust him completely.

review: Recently went for an annual visitation with Dr. Gautam Laud. He truly excels in all of these: his interpersonal skills, the way he explains about the areas warranting attention and comes up with an individualized treatment plan and last but not least, his abilities as a surgeon. His office staff are wonderful, they maintain the highest standards of hygiene.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Gautam makes you feel at home with his demeanour and calming music in the clinic. He is an expert and covid hygiene  protocols are of top standard. He engages you with his small talk and distracts you from the painful tooth job. He doesnt recommend what is not required or in your interest - puts clients interest over his fees. He is our GO TO Doc
reply_text: Thank you Jayesh for your valuable feedback

context: Dental Implant Fixing,Bone Grafting for Dental Implants,Surgical Tooth Extraction,
review:
Very very patient, totally focussed on what he was doing . Always checking if all was comfortable while the procedure was on especially with the pain one goes through. 

His staff promptly checks a day post procedure if all is well which most doctors don t really bother. 

The whole experience was excellent from his ancillary staff who are kind , caring and efficient. 

Highly recommended Doctor.
